import { useState } from 'react' const Profile = ({ onAdd }) => { const [edit, setEdit] = useState(false) const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() } return (
{edit &&
setText(e.target.value)}/>
setDay(e.target.value)}/>
setData(e.target.value)}/>
setReminder(e.currentTarget.checked)}/>
} {!edit &&
}
) } export default Profile
